content: /tprabhaathatthinte srashdaavum, andhakaaratthe maayichukallanyu srshdikallkku prakaasham nalki santoshippikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Nyangallil paripaakathayulllla nadapadikall srshdich, paapaandhakaaratthe nyangallilninnu poornnamaayi neekkikkallayename. Nyangallude kartthaavum nithya daivavume! Ninte krpayude mahaneeyakiranangallaal nyangalle prashobhippichu santoshippikkukayum cheyyaname.
Karunayulllla daivame! Ninte karunayaal nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.

Svargeeyam sainyaganam
Nin sthuthigeetham paadunnu
Bhaumikar nyangallumannirayil
Nin prabhuthaye samskrthichey-
Paathakiyaa....

Udayone! Thunacheyka-paapatthin veechikallum
Chuzhalikallum choozhunneeyenne
Shaantitthuramukhamaavuka nee
Mungaayvaan nyaaneevaaridhiyil
Kaatthidunnenanuthaapatthinnaayu
Pathrosinnennonam thrkkai neetti
Cheyyuka kaarunyam

Pethgomo- thal praarththhana nyangallkkabhayam
Pauraanika dharmmishdanmaar
Nin karunaykkaayarppichu dhoopam
Phinahaasin praarththhanayaale baadhayozhinyu
Dhoopatthaal janapaapamozhi-
Chaharon nedi-daivatthin preethi

Sthuthiyaamgyatthaal srshdikalle
Hanta nayipponellaa pulariyilum
Paarum vaanum nirayunnonava nissaaram
Sajana hrdayam nisseemam
Naathhaneyanisham-vandippon dhanyan.

Sundaratharunan shlemmone!
Velikkullllil kanyaamudrayezhum
Thoppennaare nee vaazhtthi mariyaamineyaa
Vannudayam cheythaanavallil
Thottakkaaran- parudeesaa natton

Eeredoothan kanyakayo-
Devam chonnaan krpa nirayunnolle!
Shlommo naathhan ninnodukoodennennekkum
Raajaavaayi viraajippon
Ninniludikkum-parama pavithrathayil.

Thaathan than thoppil paniyaan
Thanayan vittu pulariyilaallukalle
Nibiyare munnam pinnaale shleehanmaare
Manipathinonnil parudeesin
Thaakkolekee-parichodu choraneyum.

Naathhan bhaagyam nernnore!
Vimalanmaare! Dhanyanmaar ningall
Ihalokatthin mohangalle ningall vedinyu
Vaanilithaa nanmanavarayum
Divyavirunnum ningallkkaaysajam.

Raahel thanayan yauseppaam
Baalaneyannaall pulari vidarnnappoll
Midiyaan vartthakar kuzhiyeennum-karayathiletti
Vaangi vilaykkaa, misaremil
Chennathha chernnon raajaavaayu vaanu.

Naathhaa! Vaathilil muttunnen
Nidhinilayattheennanparththhikkunnen
Nedunaallaayu nyaan ninvazhi kaivittoru paapi
Paapamupekshichangatthe
Krpayil vaazhaan-krpa cheytheedaname.

Janakaathmajavimalaathmaave!
Nyangallodelkkum dushdaathmappadayil
Nyangallkkaavuka vanmathilum-sharanamathum nee
Satthamaretthirayum neram
Karunachirakil-cherkkuka nyangalle nee.

Naathhaa! Susmrthi nalkaname
Ninnidavakaye kaatthoridayarkkum
Nibishleehaa sahadaa satthama kahanenmaarkkum
Thalamura thalamurayennumezhum
Nirmmala sabhathan santaanangallkkum.

Pethgomo-moraan yeshumishihaa!
Udaye kadalinnudayone
Karayil kandu shishyanmaar
Udaye padakilurangippoyu
Nidraykkamaraatthunarvvallllaan
Udaye koolivillichekum
Dharmmishdanmaarkkaayu naathhan.

Udaye sthothram pallllikallil
Dayaraakallilo sthuthinaadam
Udaye myagathathi pakshikallum
Madhuram naadamuyartthunnu
Udaye kadalum dveepukallum
Janavum ninne vandippoo.

Mukilaal vellllamozhukkunnon
Mazhayaal dharaye nanaykkunnon
Paanam cheythaanaashcharyam
Maathaamariyaamin sthanyam
Maathaavathyathbhuthapoorvvam suthane paaram laallichu.

Laallikkunnu chirantananaam
Pauraanikane paithal pol
Yohaan nrtthamodethirettaan
Shishuvennonam thullllunnu
Poorvvikanaaya vayodhikane
Kaitthandilithaa laallippoo.

Shlommoyaa nibiyanmaarkkum
Shlommoyaa shleehanmaarkkum
Shlommoyaa naathhan thanne
Snehichoraam sahaderkkum
Shlommothan santaanangall
Maruvum sabhayaallkkum shlommo.

Sahadenmaare! Samaratthil
Sahabhadanaayu ninnuthsaaham
Ningallkkarulliyoraanaathhan
Sathyasneham thrkkanpaar-
Tthaadarapoorvvam valuthaakki
Ningall than perunnaallukalle.

Thaathaa maartthommaa shleehaa!
Vegam koodum thoovalinaal
Prathidaanam nedichirakaal
Paarippongum nee vaanil
Nin sukrthatthaaludayone
Ethirelppaan nee chennetthum.

Udaye praarththhichaallevam
Vishvaasiniyaakum shmooni
Simhattheppol garjichen
Puthranmaarekkolacheyyum
Raajaavaamantyokhassee-
Nnenne rakshicheedaname.

Devaa! Krpa cheytheedaname
Nin krpayin pathivinnoppam
Keniyanavaratham nyangallkkaayu
Vaykkum kudilaneyodikka
Nin sleebaa kaaval nyangall-
Kkathinaalaavatharaam nyangall.

Paapam cheythathinaal naathhaa!
Peedhakallaal shikshikkaruthe
Thaathanu samanaamaathmajane
Nibishleehanmaar nirmmalaraam
Sahadenmaarennivareyor-
Tthaliyaname ninnidavaka mel.

Rakshaka! Ninmeyu rakthangall
Kaikkondoraayu haashaaye
Saakshichorkkundaakaname
Engum susmrthi madbahaayil
Sleebaayaal jeevitharekkaa-
Tthanpaal mukthi mrtharkkarulluka.

Ennaathmaavine ningkaluyartthunnen naathhaa! Haa.......Haa
Neeyen sharanam lajikkaruthe nyaan
Doshikall naanikkum paazhppaniyil-haale.......Haale.....
Naathhaa! Ninpaathakallennekkaattiduka,

Prabha ninne vandikkunnu
Naathhaa! Vaanor vaazhtthunnu
Nin prabha thannudayatthingkal
Srshdikall ninne vandippoo

Udayatthingkalunarnnappoll
Yaakkobathbhuthameekshichu
Dharamel naattiya govanitha
Nnagram vaanilurummunnu
Vaanoreeredoothanmaa-
Rathilooderippokunnu.

Chonnaan sheemonudayatthil
Kartthaave! Nyaan ninnarikil
Etthaanarullanamennevam
Chollee naathhan thirayinmel
Nadakollkenne nampunnon
Pedicheedendonnineyum.

Kartthaave! Ninnaardrathanirayum vaathil thurannee
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallilanpundaakenam.

Goodham veettil praarththhippathilaanudayonishdam
Shabdatthaalallaarnnathubhaagyam dharmmishdanmaar
Saumyan mosha praarththhanamoolam bhaagichaazhi-
Kkoottam neengi, dushdan pharavon mungippoyi.

Daaveedin praarththhana ketteeshannaardratha thonni
Paapam mochichekee veendum pravachana shakthi
Choollaykkullllil haananiyanmaar praarththhichappoll
Theekkundatthinnavare Daivam samrakshichu.

Niryaanam nyaayatthin peedham narakam moonnum
Bheeyetteedunnen kartthaave! Ennullllatthil.

/Tkartthaave! Ninne sthothram cheyyunnathum / unnathamaaya ninte naamatthinu sthuthipaadunnathum / prabhaatha samayatthu ninte krpayeyum / raathrikaalangallil ninte vishvaasattheyum ariyi kkunnathum ethra nallathaakunnu / kartthaave! Prabhaatha samayatthu ente shabdam nee kellkkename.

/tprabhaatha samayatthu nyaan orukkatthode ninakku kaana ppedumaaraakaname / kartthaave! Ninte janangallodu karuna cheyyaname / kartthaave! Nyangallellaavarudeyum paapangall pariharichu kshamikkename / parishuddhanaayullllaave! / Ninte valathukai nyangalludemel aashvasippichu / thirunaamam nimittham nyangallude paaparogatthil ninnu / nyangalle sukhappedutthaname.
